entry.title: letmaker/liko: Liko is a simple, fast, and lightweight H5 render framework by typescript. Liko is a high-performance rendering engine based on WebGPU, designed for AI. Liko can be used for games, H5 applications, and interactive interactions.

entry.title: pranikgarg/diagonal-detection: Diagonal Detection Application is a lightweight React + TypeScript tool that visualizes diagonal movement logic within a grid. Users can click on any cell in a 10x10 grid to highlight the selected cell along with all cells aligned diagonally from itâ€”mimicking diagonal detection patterns used in games, pathfinding, and UI logic.
entry.content: Diagonal Detection Application is a lightweight React + TypeScript tool that visualizes diagonal movement logic within a grid. Users can click on any cell in a 10x10 grid to highlight the selected cell along with all cells aligned diagonally from itâ€”mimicking diagonal detection patterns used in games, pathfinding, and UI logic.
